member.name: M:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Render(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Render settings

member.name: P:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Items
member.summary: Extensions configurators

member.name: T:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension
member.summary: dhtmlxScheduler extensions

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.ActiveLinks
member.summary: Dates as links. Expected effect: day labels in month view will become a links, clicking on which will switch scheduler to the dayly view.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.AgendaView
member.summary: Agenda view. View allows to see a list of oncoming events

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Collision
member.summary: Preventing events collisions. Deny creation of the second event if one event has been already defined at that time.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Cookie
member.summary: Save state in cookie. Expected effect: scheduler will save its current state ( mode, and date ) in a cookies, so when same page will be opened next time, it will show it in the same state as was before page closing.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Editors
member.summary: Extende lightbox editors

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Expand
member.summary: Fullscreen view. Expected effect: scheduler will have expand icon at the right corner, clicking on which will change it size to full screen. Second click will restore an original size.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.HtmlTemplates
member.summary: HTML templates. Expected effect: adds ability to define templates directly in html cod

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.KeyboardNavigation
member.summary: Keyboard navigation. Expected effect: scheduler will react on right and left keys by scrolling to the next or previous time period ( next day, next week or next month, according to the currently active view )

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Limit
member.summary: Limiting date-scale. This extension allows to limit active dates ( a user won't be able to see the dates outside defined date or to create events during not-active dates )

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.MapView
member.summary: Map view. The view contains Google Map and allows to display events location on it.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Matrix
member.summary: Cell mode of Timeline view

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Minical
member.summary: Mini calendar. Mini calendar provides ability to render a small month view in any html container on a page. It has an optional on-date-selected handler and can be used to simplify date selection or for some other tasks.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Multiselect
member.summary: Multiselect control for lighbox form

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Multisource
member.summary: Multiple sources. Expected effect: scheduler will be able to use multiple source file for loading operations, including dyn. loading from multiple sources.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Offline
member.summary: Offline mode scheduler. Expected effect: page with scheduler will be cached and available from offline. Works only in browsers that supports html5 cache manifest

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.OuterDrag
member.summary: External Drag 'n Drop. Allow to use DnD between scheduler and other DHTMLX components

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.PDF
member.summary: Export to PDF. To export scheduler data to PDF you just need to add a button on the page, which will call the scheduler.toPDF('pdf generator url') method. The parameter of the toPDF() method is the url of the script, which has been installed previously:

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Readonly
member.summary: Readonly view. Expected effect: scheduler will be able to show details form in readonly state.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Serialize
F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Tooltip
member.summary: Tooltips. This extension allows to create tooltips over events in the scheduler which could be used to display additional information about event without need to actually 'open' event to check it.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.TreeTimeline
member.summary: Hierarchical Data Structure (tree mode) Allow to use tree mode in timeline view

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Url
member.summary: Save state in URL. Expected effect: scheduler will save its current state ( mode, and date ) in a URL, so when same page will be opened next time, it will show it in the same state as was before page closing. In addition to saving functionality, it adds the ability to provide links for specific date in scheduler.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.WeekAgenda
member.summary: Week agenda view. Week agenda is a combination of week and agenda views presenting a list of oncoming events inside a week.

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.GridView
member.summary: Grid view. Display events in table

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.YearView
member.summary: Year view. View allows to see a list of oncoming events

member.name: F:DHTMLX.Scheduler.SchedulerExtensions.Extension.Recurring
member.summary: Enables recurring events support

member.name: M:DHTMLX.Scheduler.Controls.SchedulerLightbox.SetExternalLightbox(System.String)
member.summary: Using form(partial view shown in iframe element) instead of native scheduler controls, which doesn't use any scheduler api, when lightbox means to be opened, scheduler pass current event id to provided view, which is supposed to process CRUD operations. unsert/update/delete/error actions must send back js code, which will update scheduler and remove iframe with form response could be generated by DHTMLX.Scheduler.Data.SchedulerFormResponseScript class
member.param: Path to the view which will be used for lightbox
